body_html: I've substituted your code into my branch of the relational-networks repo, and it runs but doesn't converge. Probably related to those failing autograd tests, but haven't figured out what's going on yet.
body_text: I've substituted your code into my branch of the relational-networks repo, and it runs but doesn't converge. Probably related to those failing autograd tests, but haven't figured out what's going on yet.
body: I've substituted your code into [my branch](https://github.com/gngdb/relational-networks) of the `relational-networks` repo, and it runs but doesn't converge. Probably related to those failing autograd tests, but haven't figured out what's going on yet.
